instructions: Wear your earphones or headphones. On your iPad, tap the Playback Destination button in the Now Playing controls, either in the app you re listening to or on the Lock screen. Or open Control Center , touch and hold the Now Playing controls at the top right, then tap the Playback Destination button . Tap Share Audio (below the name of your earphones or headphones). Bring your iPad close to your friend s iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch. Tap Share Audio on your iPad. Ask your friend to tap Join on their device.
